TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AddingNewEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供数据事件，发出信号，项是要添加到集合。The class provides data for the event, which signals that an item is about to be added to a collection. 事件为程序员来说，在事件处理程序提供了，通过设置提供新的对象的选项为这个新项的属性。The event gives the programmer, within the event handler , the option of supplying the new object by setting the property to this new item. 如果未设置此属性，集合通常将使用适当的类型的默认构造函数来构造一个新项。If this property is not set, the collection will typically use the default constructor of the appropriate type to construct a new item. 在任一情况下，会将新项添加到集合。In either case, the new item will be added to the collection. 如果集合还实现接口，项将会临时添加，等待后续提交或回滚。If the collection also implements the interface, the item will be provisionally added, waiting a subsequent commit or rollback. 此事件通常用在类中的数据绑定方案，如和。This event is commonly used in data-binding scenarios, within classes such as and . 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类来处理事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class to handle the event. 此代码示例摘自[如何： 使用 Windows 窗体 BindingSource 自定义项添加](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-item-addition-with-the-windows-forms-bindingsource.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize Item Addition with the Windows Forms BindingSource](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-item-addition-with-the-windows-forms-bindingsource.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew/CPP/form1.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew/CS/form1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew/VB/form1.vb#8)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 不使用任何参数初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using no parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认构造函数集属性`null`。The default constructor sets the property to `null`. 一个值，是`null`表明，如果未显式设置此属性，集合将采用标准的步骤，以提供要向其本身添加新项。A value that is `null` indicates that, if the does not explicitly set this property, the collection will take standard steps to provide a new item to add to itself.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(object newObject) cil managed

span.span: An to use as the new item value.

summary.span: 使用指定的对象作为新项初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified object as the new item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数集属性`newObject`参数。The constructor sets the property to the `newObject` parameter. 此对象将用作新项添加到关联的集合中，除非由事件处理程序更新此属性。This object will be used as the new item to be added to the associated collection, unless this property is updated by the event handler.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ NewObject { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置要添加到绑定列表的对象。

span.span: Gets or sets the object to be added to the binding list.

value.span: 要作为新项添加到关联的集合中的 。

span.span: The to be added as a new item to the associated collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性设置为`null`，它指示集合为执行标准的操作，通常需要创建相应的类型使用其默认构造函数，然后将它添加到集合的对象。If the property is set to `null`, it indicates that the collection is to take the standard action, which typically entails creating an object of the appropriate type using its default constructor, and then adding it to the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类来处理事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class to handle the event. 此代码示例摘自[如何： 使用 Windows 窗体 BindingSource 自定义项添加](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-item-addition-with-the-windows-forms-bindingsource.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize Item Addition with the Windows Forms BindingSource](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-item-addition-with-the-windows-forms-bindingsource.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew/CPP/form1.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew/CS/form1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataConnector.AddingNew/VB/form1.vb#8)]
